item.acairsepicweapons.dagger.tooltip_i: With less than 60% health, you can launch a series of three full and continuous attacks to gain +1 Damage and 3s of Invisibility and Invulnerability
item.acairsepicweapons.dagger.tooltip_ii: With less than 60% health, you can launch a series of three full and continuous attacks to gain +2 Damage and 3s of Invisibility and Invulnerability
With less than 60% health, you can launch a series of three full and continuous attacks to gain +3 Damage and 3.5s of Invisibility and Invulnerability
item.acairsepicweapons.dagger.tooltip_iv: With less than 60% health, you can launch a series of three full and continuous attacks to gain +4 Damage and 3.5s of Invisibility and Invulnerability
item.acairsepicweapons.dagger.tooltip_v: With less than 60% health, you can launch a series of three full and continuous attacks to gain +5 Damage and 4s of Invisibility and Invulnerability
item.acairsepicweapons.greatsword.toolti: Increases damage by 1.2x, every third attack in the series
Increases damage by 1.3x, every third attack in the series
Increases damage by 1.4x, every third attack in the series
Increases damage by 1.5x, every third attack in the series
Increases damage by 1.6x, every third attack in the series
item.acairsepicweapons.spear.tooltip_i: Slows down the enemy by 15% and deals 4 damage to the integrity of the armor
item.acairsepicweapons.spear.tooltip_ii: Slows down the enemy by 25% and deals 7 damage to the integrity of the armor
item.acairsepicweapons.spear.tooltip_iii: Slows down the enemy by 35% and deals 10 damage to the integrity of the armor.

item.acairsepicweapons.spear.tooltip_v: Slows down the enemy by 50% and deals 16 damage to the integrity of the armor
